Package com.i2group.apollo.security

Contains supplied implementations of providers that help to determine what access levels different users have to different data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimpleUserDataSourceProvider
    A simple implementation of IUserDataSourceProvider that enables all users to access all external DataSources.
    WebSphereRoleBasedPrincipalProvider
    A WebSphere-specific implementation of IPrincipalProvider that maps the roles of the Principal to values in the available access and grant SecurityDimensions.

Package com.i2group.apollo.security Description

Contains supplied implementations of providers that help to determine what access levels different users have to different data.
Since:
4.0
